title: 用了夜悠的服务端整合，运行5秒以后直接崩溃了...求解QAQ
txt_content:
报错如下
2014-12-01 22:50:29 [严重] [ForgeModLoader] Unable to launch
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)

ava:43)

java:12)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class org.fuseso
urce.jansi.internal.Kernel32

pport.java:50)

        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.<init>(DedicatedServer
.java:67)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.main(MinecraftServer.java:1700)
        ... 12 more

replies.author: liwei224
replies.txt_content: 还是自己整合吧 少年！也很方便！
经检查是环境问题，百度一个环境包下来安装就解决了

replies.author: 魁魅
replies.txt_content: 请上传完整的报错文件
